column4: i'm in a pickle guys.  which kernel should i install with x?  linux-generic, linux-image-generic, or linux-image-2.6.20.15-generic?
door number 1, door number 2, or door number 3?
please help, i've been trying to get something to run on this laptop for four hours now .. arrrrrrrgggggghhhhhh...
it's all the same kernel  and two meta packages
